conditions.other: I am delighted how the grass cover and ground has recovered after the very long, dry summer. Although watered ground it is very consistent, safe, good jumping ground. I hope you have all had a great summer, it is good to be back in action and I look forward to seeing you here on Friday. If you have any questions please give me a buzz on 07767 802206. David
